column5: Im looking into buying 2 finders, one is going to be the 898 si combo from humminbird, now I want to network it with one on the front of the boat, so my question is, what finder should I network with the 898 is there one that works better than another?  thanks
We run a 788 and 798si networked together. This is the setup that many use on the bassboats. The 788 forward and 798 at the helm. We are happy with this setup.  Safe Fishing First, Jack
